text: The successor to the Triumph Releasing Corporation, Sony Pictures Releasing is a film distribution company. It was founded in the 1990's. It distributes movies from Columbia, Screen Gems, and others. It distributed Think Like a Man, Soul Surfer, Goosebumps, the 2012 iteration of Sparkle, Once Upon a Time in Hollywood, The Angry Birds Movie 2, Easy A, The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland, The Star, Planet 51, and Concussion. Category:1990s establishments
title: Sony Pictures Releasing
